Articles.Content: Went to my downloads and it was not there, is it in the store?
It's not out yet. It's in experimentals.

That ^

I'm hoping/expecting it to be released any time from now to a couple of weeks time.
Oh, I have not seen the vids so sorry...
As said everywhere, it's not released so unless you are part of squad or a tester or part of their media group, you can't have it yet, which is good because it's not finished.

Well, doing some digging, I have discovered a pattern. The media group gets it 1 week before release. Unless a fairly major bug comes up in the next few days that requires the release to be delayed to fix, .22 will be out with about 90% certainty this Sunday.
KSP versions are never released during the weekend
Okay, then Monday. The pattern says Sunday though, so I'm not going to throw that idea away entirely yet unless HarvesteR tells us that for sure.
folks are probably confused because it was released to a lot of youtube people and nobody else. forgive them.
i think it's going to drop any day now with all the hype there making about it.

It's done when its done. Though a heads up of sorts would be nice. Once squad is ready to release it THEN give us a date. I wipe my slate clean with a fresh install every update. I don't want to have to do that in the middle of a mission. But I guess its safe to say I should stop construction of my Duna base and get everyone home before the update. Damn.. Bob just landed with the rover. He's gonna be pissed >.<

Suppose I could update whenever I'M ready...

Kurtjmac has to do a video in .21 first, then .22 will be released that day or the next.

Joking. Of course.

Well, doing some digging, I have discovered a pattern. The media group gets it 1 week before release. Unless a fairly major bug comes up in the next few days that requires the release to be delayed to fix, .22 will be out with about 90% certainty this Sunday.

I honestly think this will take a little longer, since they are still messing with the tech tree, but it shan't be much longer!

Needs to be before the 28 October, otherwise I'll have a long wait, due to losing internet for a few months to relocate. If it's not, I'll
